label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_019
content:

### Deployments & Changes
- Updated RBAC mapping table; ensured 100% removal of users from old roles.
- Implemented mobile OS MFA reset procedures; verified 66 resets with supervisor approval.
- Ran audit reconciliation; identified 4 missing ticket links, follow-ups opened.
- Verified audit pipeline lag; maintained under 10s p95 with current worker count.

### Events
- Continued org restructure: updated RBAC mapping table; ensured 100% of moved users removed from old cost-center roles.
- Reviewed helpdesk MFA resets for the mobile OS update wave; confirmed 66 resets had supervisor approval and ID verification notes.
- Ran audit reconciliation: compared role grant logs vs ticketing system; 4 missing ticket links, opened follow-ups.
- Verified audit pipeline lag after high-volume day; remained under 10s p95 with current worker count.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: S. Martinez. 1 page. 13 tickets. Status: Stable; reconciliation follow-ups opened and restructure tracked.
